scripts.deploy:good-internet: docker build -t personal_website:$npm_package_version . && docker save personal_website:$npm_package_version | gzip | pv | ssh root@kilian-gaertner.dev 'docker load'
scripts.deploy:bad-internet: docker build -t personal_website:$npm_package_version . && docker save personal_website:$npm_package_version | bzip2 | pv | ssh root@kilian-gaertner.dev 'docker load'
